name: Distress Barn Boutique 02 (Moloch), The Offshore Firm (2021)
description:
"Distress Barn Boutique 02 (Moloch)"
The Offshore Firm (2021)
1260 x 900 px, GIF

/////// One of the boutique retail workers, I think their name was Isabel, whispered to me as I browsed the new Geta Sandals, "It's time to feed the Moloch." I asked what they meant by Moloch and they pointed towards the flames pouring out of the wall installation. Another employee brought out a crate of suede ankle boots and started to toss them, one by one, into the fire. "A Moloch lives beyond that wall. Not inside the wall or outside the wall, but beyond. Every Distress Barn Boutique is bound to the mercy of their Moloch and every Moloch must see their hunger sated. Do you understand?" Isabel grew more translucent as they spoke. "Yes, I understand." /////

Metarealistic game photography depicting hypercorporate, antisocial, and sometimes liminal virtual environments.

This photographed scene was created using "The Life Stage: Virtual House," a building design simulator released in 1993 for the 3DO console.

Although the game has fallen into obscurity, it was notably ahead of its time for its use of photographic gameplay elements within an immersive 3D virtual space.

// Artwork by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG //
